info.name: Shothik AI - Humanize GPT APIs
info.description:
Complete API collection for Humanize GPT product/service in Shothik AI v3.

The Humanize GPT helps convert AI-generated content into human-like text that bypasses AI detection tools.

**Base URL:** https://api-qa.shothik.ai/api

**Total APIs:** 5 endpoints

item.name: Core Humanize API

request.description:
Humanize AI-generated text using the Panda model (free tier) with Basic level.

**Models:**
- `panda`: Free model
- `raven`: Premium model

**Levels:**
- `Basic`: Light humanization
- `Intermediate`: Moderate changes
- `Advanced`: Significant rewriting
- `Expert`: Maximum humanization
